website_summaries.verdict: A top-selling CAPM prep book by an authority in the field that's written to include updates and 180 practice questions. Updated in 2018, making this the fourth edition in a line of well-written guides.
pros: An updated CAPM exam prep book by a highly-regarded author in the field that includes current information based on relevant topics
Very in-depth, so future test-takers get a thorough overview of vital topics
Packed with activities and sample questions to help students ace the exam
cons: Although this is a comprehensive guide, some students may require additional supplemental materials to achieve their best scores

customer_reviews.title: If you want to pass your exam on the first try, this is a must
customer_reviews.text: I decided to take the CAPM exam and did not take any sort of prep course. I felt I just wasn't grasping everything as well as I should, so I bought this book 2.5 weeks before my test. It helped me TREMENDOUSLY when I followed the study instructions, and I just passed my test on the first try!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: MUST HAVE!
customer_reviews.text: This book is worth every penny!!! Though the original PMBOK is definitely an essential to have while reading this book the Rita version makes it so much more interesting and gives you many tricks to take into account when taking the test. For anyone studying for their CAPM this is a must have! I read the entire pmbok 6th edition a few months back before purchasing this and the comparison of how much I learned from this book compared to the pmbok guide is not comparable
customer_reviews.author: Vern

customer_reviews.title: A Heaven-Sent Exam Prep Book
customer_reviews.text: I can’t even begin to say how much I’m grateful for this book. I have yet to take the CAPM exam but I’m already solidifying my PMBOK Guide knowledge and I feel more confident everyday as I read through each chapter. This book explains the concepts in layman terms and gives both high and low-level examples. Not only will it help for the exam, it’ll also help for real life project management situations
customer_reviews.author: doremimi18

customer_reviews.title: Helped me pass my exam!
customer_reviews.text: The book was extremely detailed. It really focuses on the important concepts and terms to memorize. I only used this book to study for the exam and I passed the exam on my first try!
customer_reviews.author: CAPM certified!

customer_reviews.title: Get it!
customer_reviews.text: I used only Rita study material and scored above target.
customer_reviews.author: SJ

customer_reviews.title: Great Study Tool
customer_reviews.text: Lots of good info in an easy to read and understand format. I would highly recommend this book for anyone studying for the CAPM exam. They lose a star, though, because someone thought it'd be a good idea to only allow a single color in the entire book (bad design) and chose yellow for that color (shocking stupid) making some of the figures nearly impossible to read (see images as examples). How that decision made it through review is just beyond me. Ignoring that glaring flaw, the rest of the book is great.
customer_reviews.author: max

customer_reviews.title: Helped me pass on the first attempt!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this book to study two weeks prior to my CAPM exam. This was the only material that I used to study. As long as you follow the tricks & tips, you'll pass on the first try too! I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Toi Bonds

customer_reviews.title: Very useful reference book for CAPM exam!
customer_reviews.text: This is the main book I used for my CAPM exam. I read it three times before exam: 1) study, 2) organize and review. 3) review. Then I bought a CAPM exercise book for practice. I passed the exam at the 1st try. It would be great if the book can include a glossary that gives definition for terms in the book.
customer_reviews.author: Charles T

customer_reviews.title: Helpful Study Guide
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this to start studying for my CAPM. This book is very detailed and is helping me to study. I purchased this along with a physical copy of the PMBOK since I like to hold my books rather than use the electronic copy the PMI offers with your membership. Would recommend as a study resource. Good Luck!
customer_reviews.author: TriedNReviewed

customer_reviews.title: The only study tool you’ll need
customer_reviews.text: This book is excellent and key for passing the CAPM! It has all the material needed along with study tools that will guarantee you will pass if you follow the guidelines. I just passed the CAPM yesterday scoring “Above Target” on all 13 target levels! Great product and worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Nick Dahl

customer_reviews.title: Not a Book only A friend as well...
customer_reviews.text: Rita’s CAPM exam prep book is one of the best ever.i think it’s the only book to pass CAPM and understand the basic concepts of Project Management.
customer_reviews.author: Tariq Mengal

customer_reviews.title: Passed on the first try
customer_reviews.text: This book was very helpful! Using the book as well as a class provided by my University, I was able to pass the CAPM exam on the first try. This book really emphasizes important sections to study, key knowledge areas, and helps with exam prep. For the money, it's the best out there.
customer_reviews.author: Sam Loyning
